title: PVP.net problem
body: so when i download the game, the game said "PVP.net has stopped working. A problem caused the program to stop working correctly. Windows will close program and notify you if a solution is available." how am i going to fix it?

replies.body: It seems like you lost connection to the services within the client, so you may be unable to use chat or the store.  Your best bet is to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this block and restore comms.  Let me know if you have any questions!
